params.minimumBudget: The minimum budget required for the asset

params._fee: The fee from the yap budget (1% = 1000, 0.75% = 750)

returns._0: The ID of the new yap request

params.winnersRewards: Array of corresponding reward amounts for each winner
params.yapRequestId: The ID of the yap request

topUpRequest(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: The total budget (additionalBudget + additionalFee) must be greater than the minimum budget for the asset

params.additionalBudget: The additional budget to add to the yap request
params.additionalFee: The additional fee to add to the yap request
params.yapRequestId: The ID of the yap request to top up

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner. Setting `newOwner` to the zero address is allowed; this can be used to cancel an initiated ownership transfer.

updateAssetRequirements(address,uint256).details: The asset must be supported, and the minimum fee and budget must be greater than zero

params.asset: The address of the asset to update
params.minimumBudget: The new minimum budget for the asset

params.amount: The amount of fees to withdraw
params.to: The address to send fees to

addAssetSupport(address,uint256).notice: Add support for a new asset

createRequest(uint256,uint256,address,st.notice: Creates a new yap request with specified a budget

getAllAssets().notice: Gets the address of the Kaito token

getFeeBalance(address).notice: Gets the fee balance for a specific asset

getMinimumBudget(address).notice: Gets the minimum budget for a specific asset

getTotalBalance(address).notice: Gets the total balance of the contract for a specific asset

getTotalYapRequests().notice: Gets the total number of yap requests

getWinners(uint256).notice: Gets the winners for yap requests

getYapRequest(uint256).notice: Gets a yap request by ID

isAdmin(address).notice: Checks if an address is an admin

isAssetSupported(address).notice: Checks if an asset is supported

rewardAffiliateFromFees(uint256,address,.notice: Distributes fees rewards to affiliate of a yap campaign

rewardYapWinners(uint256,address[],uint2.notice: Distributes rewards to winners of a yap request

topUpRequest(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Top up an existing yap request with additional budget and fee

updateAssetRequirements(address,uint256).notice: Update minimum requirements for an asset
